Stanza 1:

Ni thai mozhli pesidum pothu..Antha angilam thembathu paaru..Haiyai yoo enaku pavama iruku 
PM GS   S S    SRS n   SRRG   P M   G S S   SRS n n   S  S   p  p   S   Sn R  R R RG SS S

Ni ennidam pesidum bothu.. Motha peNNinam yenguthu paaru..Haiyaiyo..enaku bayama iruku 
PM G S S   SRSn n  SRRG    P M   GS S S   MG S n   S  S   p  p  S   Sn R  R R RG SS S

Undhan Marapai, nerakkum vela mattum  Enakippo kidaikuma?

Poda paalaiku poonaiyai kaaval veika enakenna paithiyama?

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
Ni unjalil aadidum bothu.. Intha ulaghamey aadidum paaru.. Haiyai yo enaku kushiyai iruku 

Niyum moasamai partidum bothu..Endhan adaikum koosedhe paaru Haiyaiyo..enaku bothaiyai iruku.. 

Unnai parkatha naal ellam naaleh illai Yenudaya kalander'lil 
Niyum thindada bahangal uyirodillai Enudaya dhegathilley 
Idha udalo un viral meetum key board ah? 

(Mobila... Mobila... )
